name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
details: High-fidelity sound with noise cancellation and 20-hour battery life.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
details: Adjustable lumbar support, breathable mesh, and smooth-gliding casters for ultimate comfort.

name: Smart LED Television (55 inch)
details: 4K UHD display with built-in Android TV, voice control, and multiple HDMI ports.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
details: Double-walled insulation keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. 750ml capacity.

name: Portable Power Bank (10000mAh)
details: Compact design with dual USB output for fast charging of smartphones and tablets.

name: Organic Green Tea Bags (Pack of 100)
details: Premium quality green tea, rich in antioxidants, for a refreshing and healthy brew.

name: Fitness Tracker Smartwatch
details: Monitors heart rate, steps, sleep, and calories burned. Water-resistant with long battery life.

name: Beginner Acoustic Guitar
details: Full-size dreadnought guitar with a natural finish, ideal for aspiring musicians.

name: Set of 3 Scented Candles
details: Assorted fragrances (lavender, vanilla, sandalwood) for a relaxing ambiance. 30-hour burn time each.

name: USB-C to HDMI Adapter
details: Connects your USB-C enabled device to an HDMI display. Supports 4K resolution.
